long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Blumgi Soccer: A refreshing and fun physics-based soccer game that takes you into a unique world of soccer!

Welcome to Blumgi Soccer! This is a refreshing and fun physics-based soccer game that allows you to fully enjoy the excitement of playing soccer in a unique world.

Key Features:

Physics Engine: Blumgi Soccer utilizes physics engine technology, making the movements of players and the ball appear more realistic. You can feel the bouncing, rolling, and collision of the ball, as well as the skills and actions of the players. Utilize the laws of physics to control the interaction between players and the ball, creating surprising soccer moments.

Fresh Visuals: The game features a fresh visual style that gives a soothing and pleasant feeling. The field, players, and ball are presented with vibrant and detailed graphics, creating a lively and enchanting world of soccer. Enjoy the exquisite visual effects and immerse yourself in the joy of soccer matches.

Simple and Fun Controls: The game offers simple and intuitive controls that anyone can easily pick up. With simple touches and swipes, you can control the movement, passing, and shooting of the players. Use the right amount of force and angle to engagein intense competitions against opponents, and fully enjoy the charm of soccer.
